description:
The beloved Ultra Raptor trail runner got an overhaul for fast-and-light and everyday hiking. Lightweight and cushioned to feel like a running shoe, the mid-height version has the additional collar for ankle protection and stability. The extremely sticky rubber sole and waterproof-breathable membrane provide peace of mind in loose and wet terrain.

  • Breathable mesh upper with TPU overlays for structure
  • Microfibre mudguard and rubber toe cap add durability
  • Gore-Tex® Extended Comfort membrane keeps water out
  • Wicking mesh lining keeps feet cool and dry
  • Injection-moulded MEMlex foam for support and cushion
  • Nylon shank adds torsional stability
  • FriXion® XF 2.0 outsole with an Impact Brake System™ for durable grip and control
name: La Sportiva Ultra Raptor II MID Gore-Tex Light Trail Shoes - Men's
